COMMON.TITLE: Animefind
COMMON.NORESULT: No data found, swipe down to reload
COMMON.ERROR: An error has occurred, swipe down to reload
COMMON.APP_DESCRIPTION: Animefind is an application with the information of all the animes and manga, you can also list the chapters of the animes and see the information
COMMON.APP_FIND: Any questions or problems, you can contact me at crislaez30@gmail.com, or through the following links

ERRORS.ERROR_LOAD_MOST_ANTICIPATED_ANIME_LIST: Error loading most anticipated anime list
ERRORS.ERROR_LOAD_BEST_EVALUATED_ANIME_LIST: Error loading best evaluated anime list
ERRORS.ERROR_LOAD_MOST_POPULAR_ANIME_LIST: Error loading most popular anime list
ERRORS.ERROR_LOAD_MOST_ANTICIPATED_MANGA_LIST: Error loading most anticipated manga list
ERRORS.ERROR_LOAD_BEST_EVALUATED_MANGA_LIST: Error loading best evaluated manga list
